casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Darius Jovan JONES, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157467
COA: 341840 Supreme Court of Michigan. June 11, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to file a supplement to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The supplement submitted on June 4, 2018, is accepted for filing.
